title: Sorting & Pagination
description: Learn to sort results in ascending/descending order and implement pagination for large datasets.
example:
-- Get oldest users
SELECT * FROM users 
ORDER BY created_at ASC 
LIMIT 10;

-- Sort orders by total amount highest first
SELECT * FROM orders 
ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

-- Paginate users alphabetically
SELECT * FROM users 
ORDER BY name ASC 
LIMIT 20 OFFSET 0;  -- Page 1

-- Multi-column sorting
SELECT * FROM products 
ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;

-- Sort with NULL handling
SELECT * FROM products 
ORDER BY category NULLS LAST, price DESC;
useCase: Result ordering, pagination, top-N queries, leaderboards, chronological listings
